a government service in the US for poor people that pays for their medical treatment
Add to word list
Add to word list
in the US, a government program that pays for medical treatment for poor people: Some people are too poor to afford health insurance but earn too much to qualify for Medicaid. About 555,000 children are currently covered under Medicaid. Medicaid programs/services/costs Medicaid patients/recipients/officials
